Reviews.Title: “Perfect budget stay in Venice/Lido”
Reviews.Author: Sarah N
Reviews.Content: hotels location perfect 10minute water bus center venice distance burano murano beautiful islands wellworth visit helped finding hotel minute hotel surrounded nice decently priced local bars restaurants dont feel touristy hotel staff friendly breakfast extravagant price convenience perfect

Reviews.Title: “reasonable hotel 10 minutes from Venice”
Reviews.Author: andreadic
Reviews.Content: location venezia lido near public boat service venice nice surroundings price standard venice drawbacks 21 incredibly noisy morning near kitchen wakeup 7 am anyway stay ground floor avoid ground floor internet pay extra

Reviews.Title: “the owner places his porche cayenne before the entrance”
Reviews.Author: eric032
Reviews.Content: owner morning entrance money spent 1 window nice view super market noicy started 6 oclock dark terrace terrace surplus 25 euro 1 night outside seat guests stay bed breakfast ok omelette pay 8 euro expresso coffee 3 euro pay pay paythe bathroom door shower 30 cm husband shower
